scripts.start: npm run server-build && npx cross-env ENV=production node server/dist/index.uws.js
scripts.start:worker: npm run server-build && npx cross-env ENV=production node server/dist/index.uws.worker.js
scripts.start:pm2: npm run server-build && npx cross-env ENV=production npm run pm2-puppeteer-ssr:uws
scripts.start:pm2:worker: npm run server-build && npx cross-env ENV=production npm run pm2-puppeteer-ssr:uws:worker
scripts.build:esm: cross-env ESM=true npx vite build && npx vue-tsc
scripts.preview: cross-env MODE=development ENV=production npm run start-preview
scripts.preview:fastify: cross-env MODE=development ENV=production npm run start-preview:fastify
scripts.preview:uws: cross-env MODE=development ENV=production npm run start-preview:uws
scripts.start-puppeteer-ssr: cross-env npx pm2 -i 1 --silent start npm --name "start-puppeteer-ssr" -- run pm2-puppeteer-ssr
scripts.format: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint:fix
scripts.pre-commit: npm run server-build && git add ./server/dist & npx vue-tsc && lint-staged --allow-empty
scripts.prepare: git config core.autocrlf false && npx husky install

lint-staged.*.{vue,js,jsx,ts,tsx}: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint
